name: PlatformerMaker
description:
This is a game, where you can create games (platformers) without coding, worrying about syntax errors, graphics and all that nerd stuff.

How2Play:

  • Press create to create your game or press play to play other's creations
  • This game uses an ID system, in "Create" mode ID shows up in the right-down corner and you have to type ID in the main menu next to "Play" button to play the level.
  • You can share your masterpiece(s) in comments ;)
